description: VIBRANT & HEARTY With Mr Chen’s range of dumplings, noodles and sauces, you can have a satisfying noodle stir-fry with succulent pork dumplings on the table in minutes.
name: Sticky Soy & Sesame Dumpling Stir-Fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 pkt 550g pkt frozen Mr Chen’s Pork & Chive Dumplings
1 pkt 400g pkt Mr Chen’s Singapore Noodles
1 pkt woolworths cook stir fry mix superfood vegetables
2 pkt spring onions, thinly sliced, to serve

recipeInstructions.text: Combine sauces, garlic and sesame oil in a small bowl.

Place half of the vegetable oil and fl cup cold water in a large non-stick frying pan over medium heat. Add dumplings and cook, covered, for 7 minutes. Uncover and cook over medium-high heat for 4 minutes or until water has evaporated and dumplings are golden underneath. Transfer to a plate and set aside.
Meanwhile, prepare noodles according to packet instructions.

Heat remaining oil in same cleaned frying pan over high heat. Cook vegetables for 1 minute, stirring, or until tender. Add noodles and sauce mixture, then cook for 2 minutes, stirring, or until noodles are heated through and sauce has thickened slightly and is glossy. Add dumplings and toss to coat. Serve topped with sesame seeds and onion.
